text.section: At least once a year, the Director, in conjunction with a county health officer, shall evaluate each private therapeutic group home.

section.section:
The Director, in conjunction with a county health officer shall:
Prepare a written report of each evaluation; and
Distribute a copy of this report to each private therapeutic group home.
The Director shall keep at least 1 copy of the report.
The Secretary shall consider the report when renewing a license of any private therapeutic group home.
